Title: libarchive: Multiple vulnerabilities
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in libarchive, the worst
    of which could lead to a Denial of Service condition.

Background.Text: libarchive is a library for manipulating different streaming archive formats, including certain tar variants, several cpio formats, and both BSD and GNU ar variants.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in libarchive. Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

Impact.Text: A remote attacker, via a specially crafted file, could possibly cause a Denial of Service condition.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All libarchive users should upgrade to the latest version:
